des:
Author: Chris Warman
Voice actor: Matthew Mercer

Playtime: 70 to 90 minutes
Age: 14+


The years of peace are over. Shocking news is pouring in from the borderlands of the Kingdom of Rivaan. An old enemy, Morghul, has regained strength, shattering the alliance with the mysterious order.

A hero is needed! A hero who will get to the bottom of things and report back to the king. But who will undertake such a dangerous mission? Why you!

Welcome to the tranquil village of Stoneville, home to a monastery of the mysterious order and currently severely troubled by bandits. Or at least that's how it appears. But it is soon revealed that things are not as they seem. For some answers, one has to look far into the past.

That's how your long, adventurous, and at times hilarious journey begins. You'll meet friends and foes, solve puzzles, fight courageous battles, and discover secrets from times past. It surely will be a challenging adventure for a lone hero.

Fortunately, you won't be going alone on this adventure! You'll have a loyal companion at your side, one who'll guide your decisions and help you through difficult times. You'll undoubtedly love her! Or maybe now. She might just drive you crazy.

The Iron Falcon is an interactive audio story suitable for both beginners as well as seasoned players of classic gamebooks. It's an audio game that's easy to learn and offers plenty of choices along the way as well as entertaining features such as random encounters, hidden plot options, devious puzzles, and multiple endings. It is also a tongue-in-cheek homage to our favorite gamebooks of yesteryears, particularly Lone Wolf by Joe Denver. We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we did creating it!


The Iron Falcon was created with TWIST, our very own interactive storytelling tool for Voice. With TWIST, anyone can easily create interactive Voice stories using a flowchart-like, visual, codeless interface. Upon completion, stories can easily be deployed as Alexa Skills.
